Name: Can You Hear Me Smiling: A Child Grieves a Sister
Description: The books 9 year old author recounts with honesty, tenderness, and courage the story of her older sister's illness and passing and the range of emotions she experienced during this difficult time. With an afterword by two leading children's grief experts. Communicates to young survivors of a sibling death that they are not alone. Illustrated by Leigh (Lawhon) Frampton
